messages.subject: Re: peace maker kurogane
messages.msgSnippet: The second season is manga only. The anime only has one season, and it is a mix of both manga, although it uses more more the first (Shinsengumi Imon
messages.messageBody:
The "second season" is manga only. The anime only has one season, and
it is a mix of both manga, although it uses more more the first
(Shinsengumi Imon Peacemaker). Some plot elements, such as Saitou's
appearance, come from the sceond (Peace Maker Kurogane).
As Kaneyoshi wrote, here are 24 episodes. Currently, ADV has 6 discs
(w/ 21 eps.) out. I'm not sure when the 7th will be out.
Manga-wise though, SIPM is not licensed. If you want to read it, you
can get the scanlations from http://www.mangacity.net PMK is licensed
by ADV, and up to volume 4 is currently out.


--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Logan" <wolverinesg7@y...> wrote:
> you said that there are two seasons is the second season in manga
> for or tv series?

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: peace maker kurogane
messages.msgSnippet: Even I ve been looking for that manga... No luck. I think they stopped printing? (somebody please correct me on this!) But nevertheless, I hope ADV licenses
messages.messageBody:
Even I've been looking for that manga... No luck. I think they stopped printing? (somebody please correct me on this!) But nevertheless, I hope ADV licenses Imon Peacemaker.. That way, fans won't have to scour for them in obscure places.

If you're okay with scanlations, I suggest Manga City. I don't know if they have it over at Direct Manga, but check it out just in case. And oh! www.stoptazmo.com also have them.

Or if you want, the pm_kurogane community over at LJ created an email account for the downloaded scans. You can just email them to yourself from there ^^ For details, please contact me privately.


~Kane


Bunny ^_^ <shenlong71328@...> wrote:

manga that ADV put out and got hooked. I was
wondering if anyone knows where you can find
Shinsengumi Imon in english. And if anyone knows if
ADV is planing on realeaseing the rest of Kurogane.
Thanks a bunch to all. ^______________^

-Bunneh

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] peace maker kurogane
messages.msgSnippet: Peacemaker Kurogane has two seasons ; first is bases off the Shinsengumi Imon Peacemaker manga (or vice versa), and the second one isn t out yet--or if
messages.messageBody:
Peacemaker Kurogane has two "seasons"; first is bases off the Shinsengumi Imon Peacemaker manga (or vice versa), and the second one isn't out yet--or if they're even going to turn it into an anime, not sure. Which will most probably be based on the Peacemaker Kurogane manga, the ones licensed by ADV.

The anime has 24 episodes. Imon Peacemaker manga has 6 volumes, and Peacemaker Kurogane manga, I think, has 5 or six volumes.

Hope that helps!



~Kane
